channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Roger Penske, The Lion In Winter, Reacts After Indy 500 Embarrassment
item.description: Roger Penske, after a cheating scandal this week, fired three leaders of his IndyCar race team. It was another controversy for the Lion in Winter.

item.title: How Tech And Trust Are Encouraging Independence Of Autistic Teenagers
item.description: Across all expert voices, a central message is clear: technology can enable autonomy for teenagers, but it cannot replace community.

item.title: Forget Ray-Ban Meta: Google Smart Glasses Will Feature Warby Parker’s Cool Styling
item.description: Google has just revealed that it’s working with Warby Parker, Kering Eyewear and Gentle Monster to create more desirable smart glasses. Here’s what we...

item.title: What Regeneron's Purchase Of 23andMe Means For Your Genetic Privacy
item.description: Your DNA, new owner—what Regeneron's purchase of 23andMe means for your genetic privacy.

item.title: Google I/O 2025: Android Takes A Back Seat To AI And XR
item.description: Google's work on AI is only accelerating, with Gemini 2.5 as a major driver. That plus more investment in a strong XR ecosystem have improved Google’s...

item.title: “How do I get the most of out my people?”
item.description: Alas, this is the wrong question for a leader or manager to ask. It’s more productive to wonder, “how do we create the conditions for our people to ge...

item.title: The most important decision

item.title: “They’re not paying me enough to care”
item.description: This is an understandable sentiment. As jobs push people to be automatons and often offer little in the way of respect, it’s easy to quietly quit. But...

item.title: The Impact Matrix: Moving to the golden quadrant

item.title: Getting to next
